title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
Nothing strange showing in Hardware monitors, ran Apple Hardware Test and no issues shown. I can't seem to download any compatible ASD's that will extract correctly so havne't been able to try that.

Etrecheck complains heavy kernel tasking.

Any other suggestions?

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
First of all, try another RAM module and HDD.
Also test with USB macOS, disconnecting internal HDD.
Trackpad board/flex as first suspects.

Run HWMonitor and check for strange temp values.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
Nothing strange in HW monitor. tried different RAM and running external HD only. Tried different trackpad and flex.

Runs fine in safe boot. No lag or high fans. Testing with a clean OS also.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message: Is time to try clean ME BIOS.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message: I did already reflash the bios clean me also. :(

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
Depending of the manufactured year, you need ASD 3S144, or 3S155.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OM9taRMGrNpeuchn52tZ0CwlHNy1HERm/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L3YHYvKwh4xLpqYpoptCKxlGv1IkcHc5/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message: THANK YOU! I've been trying to find ASD's I could download and use. Anything I was able to download wouldn't extract properly. Spent many hours searching for solutions.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message: It appears those download links you provided were not the complete files? One was 74MB the other 43MB and both were instructions, references only for the ASD software.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
Full ASD 3S155 EFI + OS should be around 2.7GiB, it should work on all 820-3115. Download from the usual Russian torrent.
(boards with Mojave BootROM update may not boot ASD EFI but ASD OS will still work)
You can also use MRI 64-bit.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
I only posted EFI ASD files.
Usually ASD OS is not required to run.

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message: There were no .dmg files in the downloads. Only PDF.[ATTACH type="full"]59544[/ATTACH]

title: 820-3115 Boots, High Fans, Significant Lag
message:
Hmmm, one file has dmg extension!!!
And the other one will also extract a dmg...
